screeningSummary: Data analyst mapping corporate board connections - finds policy changes after cross-industry meetings

lines.text: Corporate connections, Vern. I've been mapping board memberships across companies, and something strange keeps coming up.

lines.text: Interlocking directorates. That's not unusual in big business.

lines.text: Not unusual individually. But the pattern extends beyond one industry. Media companies, defense contractors, pharmaceutical firms - they all share board members at the highest levels.
